body.default:
Hello {'*|FNAME|*'},

This email confirms your response to "{'*|CALLOUTTITLE|*'}" using your email address {'*|EMAIL|*'}.

If you have any questions, please contact our support team at {'*|SUPPORTEMAIL|*'}.

Best wishes

contribution.adminCancelDescription: If you cancel the contact's contribution their membership will finish at the end of their current payment cycle on {date}.
contribution.cancelDescription: If you cancel your contribution your membership will finish at the end of your current payment cycle on {date}.
contribution.cancelMessage: We're sorry to see you go.
contribution.changeBank: Change to a different bank account
contribution.changeBankInfo: You'll be asked for the details of your new bank account in the next step.
contribution.dueToRenew: Your contribution is due to renew on {renewalDate}.
contribution.expiredText: Please consider renewing, even if at the lowest amount it would help us immensely. Thank you!
contribution.hasPendingPayment: Your payment is currently being processed.
contribution.manualPayment: You are currently paying your membership contribution via {source}. By paying through our membership system you'll help us to know how much money from our members we can rely on month on month and it'll be easier for you to manage your contribution.
contribution.nextAmountChanging: Your contribution will change to {nextAmount} on {renewalDate}.

paymentHistory.empty: Past payments and their invoices will show up here.

contribution.prorateDecreaseMessage: You have one month left on your current contribution. | You have {n} months left on your current contribution.
contribution.prorateDecreaseMessageWillStart: Your new contribution will start on {renewalDate}.
contribution.prorateIncreaseMessage: You have one month left on your current contribution. | You have {n} months left on your current contribution.
contribution.prorateIncreaseMessageOneOff: You can make a one-off payment of {oneOffPayment} to start your new contribution immediately.
contribution.prorateNoText: You'll stay on your current contribution until then.
contribution.prorateYesText: You'll be charged a one-off payment of {oneOffPayment} now and your contribution will be updated immedately
contribution.updatedPaymentSource: Your payment method has been updated.
contribution.willRenew: Your contribution will automatically renew on {renewalDate}.
contribution.willRenewWithNewAmount: Your contribution will automatically renew on {renewalDate} and will change to your chosen amount of {nextAmount}.

editCallout.replicated: Your CrowdNewsroom was successfully replicated, and you are now editing the new copy. Be sure to edit the title in the "Title and Image" tab.
editCallout.title: Edit: {title}
editCallout.warning: Careful! You are editing a live CrowdNewsroom. Changing form properties carries the risk of rendering previous answers unusable.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate this email? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDelete.messageWithMailings: This email has been sent {count} time(s). Are you sure you want to delete it? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDelete.title: Deactivate Email

confirmResetToDefault.message: Are you sure you want to reset this template to its default? Your custom changes will be lost.
confirmResetToDefault.title: Reset to Default

description.cancelled-contribution: Sent to members when their recurring contribution is cancelled. Typically includes information about when the membership ends, as well as the member ID. May contain a link to a survey.
description.cancelled-member: Sent to administrators when a member cancels their contribution. Typically includes a notification with the ID and name of the cancelled member.
description.confirm-email: Sent to new users during the registration process to verify their email address. Contains a confirmation link they must click to complete registration.
description.contribution-didnt-start: Sent to members when their Stripe subscription payment could not be started (e.g., declined payment method, insufficient funds). Informs them that their membership has been revoked due to the payment failure.
description.email-exists-login: Sent when someone attempts to register with an email address that already exists and belongs to an active member with a password set. Provides a login link so they can access their existing account.
description.email-exists-set-password: Sent when someone attempts to register with an email address that already exists and belongs to an active member who has not yet set a password. Provides a link to set a password.
description.manual-to-automatic: Sent to members when their payment method is successfully changed from manual to automatic recurring payment. Confirms the successful change.
description.new-callout-response: Sent to administrators when a new response to a CrowdNewsroom is submitted. Typically includes a notification with the CrowdNewsroom details and the name of the responding person.
description.new-member: Sent to administrators when a new member successfully joins the community. Typically includes a notification with the ID and name of the new member.
description.one-time-donation: Sent to users after they complete a one-time contribution.
description.one-time-donation-failed: Sent to users when their one-time contribution payment fails.
description.reset-device: Sent when a user requests to reset their trusted device for two-factor authentication. Contains a secure link to reset the device.
description.reset-password: Sent when a user requests to reset their password. Contains a secure link to reset the password.
description.setup-account: Sent to users who have completed a one-time contribution and don't have an account yet.
description.welcome: Sent to new members after they complete the registration process. This email welcomes them to the community.

forgotPassword.description: Please enter your email address and we'll send you password reset instructions.
forgotPassword.message: If there is an account associated with {email}, you will receive an email shortly. Check your spam folder if it doesn't appear.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?

api.account-locked: Account locked due to too many failed login attempts. Please reset your password or contact support for help.

api.payment-failed: Your payment was not successful. Please try again or use a different payment method.

absorbFeeText.one-time: Our payment processor charges us per transaction which means we receive less from one-time contributions. Would you like to absorb the {fee} transaction fee?

joinSurvey.required: Users must complete the survey before proceeding
